entries.title: Lock in a lifetime of data recovery for Windows for 19% off
entries.description:
Try as you might, you’re going to lose files from time to time. Windows has its own recovery tools to help you recover lost files, but sometimes you have to dig a bit deeper. That’s where a recovery program like MiniTool Power Data Recovery comes in handy.

Offering a ton of bang for your buck, Power Data Recovery is a 100% clean data recovery software that helps you recover an unlimited amount of deleted or lost data from Windows computers, memory/SD cards, USB flash drives, external hard drives, and more. In addition, you can recover data from inaccessible, formatted drives, music files from CDs and DVD drives, and even retrieve accidentally lost photos from previous Windows versions as far back as Windows 7. And with a perpetual license, you’ll have support for three PCs and a lifetime of free upgrades.

See why MiniTool Power Data Recovery earned a 4.4/5-star rating on G2, 4.5/5 stars on Capterra, and 4.6/5 stars on Trustpilot. You can get a lifetime subscription for 19% off at just $79.99 today.

 

MiniTool Power Data Recovery Personal: Lifetime Subscription – $79.99

Recover Any File

Prices subject to change.

Backup and Recovery
